General.Name: Sansteel MinGuang Co Ltd Fujian
General.Description: Sansteel MinGuang Co., Ltd., Fujian manufactures and sells iron and steel products in China. The company offers building materials, metal, medium and thick plates, round steel, alloy strip steel, and coal chemical products. Sansteel MinGuang Co.,Ltd.,Fujian was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Sanming, China.

3.Name: Mr. Honglin  Hu
3.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Head of the Securities Affairs Department
